name: Ewe Chinonso Irene
bio: I am Ewe Irene Chinonso, Vice President, External Affairs NUMSA 23/24 Administration. As a dedicated and ambitious individual, I bring a unique blend of experiences to my role. Originally from Rivers State, I joined Nile University of Nigeria as a transfer student from Ukraine and am currently pursuing my studies at the 500 level. With a passion for knowledge sharing, collaboration, and community building, I am committed to leveraging my position to empower NUMSAites. My vision is to foster a supportive environment that nurtures diverse talents, promotes skill development, and shapes the future of medicine. I look forward to making a meaningful impact and contributing to the growth of our community.
